mapper.select: select (board_title, board_content, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_start_date, board_period, board_contact) from tbl_board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (board_title, board_content, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_start_date, board_period, board_contact) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardWay}, #{boardRecruitNumber}, #{boardStartDate}, #{boardPeriod}, #{boardContact})
